inputValue.name: Sema4.ai Actions - Test Document
inputValue.body: PREPENDED: This content should appear at the beginning of the document.

inputValue.name: Sema4.ai Actions - Test Document
inputValue.body: APPENDED: This content should appear at the end of the document.

schemaDescription: name: string: The Google Document name
body: string: The Google Document body as an Extended Markdown string
position: ['prepend', 'append'] (Whether to prepend (insert at beginning) or append (insert at end) content)
tab_index: integer: Optional tab index to insert content into a specific tab
tab_title: string: Optional tab title to insert content into a specific tab
metadata.actionSignature: action/args: "name: str, body: str, oauth_access_token: OAuth2Secret[Literal['google'], list[Literal['https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.file', 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/documents']]], position: Literal['prepend', 'append']='append', tab_index: int=None, tab_title: str=None"
